contest-event.event-date:
May 22, 1899 D East Grinstead Contest (Second Section)
East Grinstead Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest East Grinstead Contest east-grinstead-contest-second-section
La Sonnambula [arr. Round]
East Grinstead, Sussex 1st prize £6 and cornet. 2nd prize £4.15s and clarinet! 3rd prize £3.3s. and trombone. 4th prize £2.2s. March contest 1st (£1) Wargrave Industrial School(Tender and True), 2nd (10s.) Cranleigh(The Avenue) 5 bands competed.
April 13, 2012, 2:50 p.m. June 25, 2017, 10:52 a.m.
1 Cranleigh Military J. Blacklidge
2 Wokingham All Saints Sam Cope
3 Handcross Military C. O. Soquist
4 Wargrave Industrial School W. Connor
5 Haslemere Institute Unknown
